nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 60. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. East northeast wind 0 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
